articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google shifts Android news to a virtual event ahead of its I/O developer conference - TechCrunch
articles.description: News about Android is being relegated to a side show at Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O, next month. On Monday, the company announced it
articles.content: News about Android is being relegated to a side show at Google’s annual developer conference, Google I/O, next month. On Monday, the company announced it would share information about the latest upda… [+1153 chars]
